feed.title: Ottawa Jazz Happenings
feed.subtitle: A listing of gigs in the Ottawa area submitted by area musicians

entry.title: Glebop Jazz Trio Vocal Jazz Series, with Christine Fagan
entry.summary:
When: Sun Jan 4, 2015 6pm to Sun Jan 4, 2015 8pm  EST

Where: The Arrow and the Loon Pub, 99 Fifth Ave (at Bank), Ottawa ON, 613-237-0448
Event Status: confirmed
Event Description: The first Sunday of every month, the Arrow and the Loon Pub features some of Ottawa's finest jazz vocalists backed by the Glebop Jazz Trio: John Haysom (trumpet), Howard Tweddle (bass), Bert Waslander (piano). more info613-563-7044
entry.content:
When: Sun Jan 4, 2015 6pm to Sun Jan 4, 2015 8pm EST

entry.title: Hugh O'Connor Duo
entry.summary:
Recurring Event
First start: 2014-11-02 16:00:00 EST
Duration: 10800
Where: Chez Lucien, 137 Murray Street, Ottawa, ON, 613-241-3533
Event Status: confirmed
Event Description: Hugh O'Connor - sax J.P. Allain - piano Hugh has played his sax with everyone important in the jazz scene – and many visiting musicians – for decades. In 2010, at age 81, he released his first CD, For the First Time. Read OttawaJazzScene.ca's coverage of the CD Release concert: http://ottawajazzscene.ca/news/940-full-house-celebrates-hugh-oconnors-cd-release-qfor-the-first-timeq
entry.content:

entry.title: Options Jazz: Tom McMahon Trio
entry.summary:
When: Sat Mar 23, 2013 8pm to 11:59pm  EDT
Replaces event originally scheduled for: Sat Mar 23, 2013 8pm

Where: Brookstreet Hotel, Options Jazz Lounge, 525 Legget Dr, Ottawa ON, 613-271-1800, www.brookstreet.ca
Event Status: confirmed
Event Description: Live Jazz seven days a week! Relax in the rich and elegant warmth of a sophisticated lounge with jazz filling the air. No cover charge; no reservations required; free high speed WiFi; mouth-watering culinary creations. Please note that age of majority is required after 9 p.m. See details on times and music lineup here: http://www.brookstreet.ca/options_music.php

entry.title: Options Jazz: The Worst Pop Band Ever
entry.summary:
When: Fri Apr 18, 2014 8pm to 11:59pm  EDT
Replaces event originally scheduled for: Fri Apr 18, 2014 8pm

Where: Brookstreet Hotel, Options Jazz Lounge, 525 Legget Dr, Ottawa ON, 613-271-1800, www.brookstreet.ca
Event Status: confirmed
Event Description: The acclaimed Toronto Jazz group, the Worst Pop Band Ever, featuring Juno Winners Adrean Farrugia and Chris Gale, along with Remi Jean LeBlanc and Tim Shia will be visiting Ottawa again. The Group has played in Ottawa 3 times already, including at the NAC, Confed Park for Canada Day as part of the Ottawa Jazz Festival, and at the late Cafe Paradiso, shortly before it closed. From Tim: I've been to Ottawa numerous times playing with Peter Hum and Pete Liu and am a regular member of Kevin Barrett and Julie Michels groups. Anyways, hope to see and meet some other Jazzwork folks this time out. "The music's fresh, may appeal to pop lovers but assuredly to jazzers keen on a kind of driven luency as genre stylings are examined, discarded and reworked." (G.Chapman,Toronto Star) “…music for people, whether they dig jazz or not…a tight band playing with substance and feeling for an appreciative audience.” (Mark Turner, Allaboutjazz.com July 2012). ~~ Live Jazz seven days a week! Relax in the rich and elegant warmth of a sophisticated lounge with jazz filling the air. No cover charge; no reservations required; free high speed WiFi; mouth-watering culinary creations. Please note that age of majority is required after 9 p.m. See details on times and music lineup here: http://www.brookstreet.ca/options_music.php

entry.title: Options Jazz: Steve Berndt & Robin Pitre
entry.summary:
When: Sat Sep 7, 2013 8pm to 11:59pm  EDT
Replaces event originally scheduled for: Sat Sep 7, 2013 8pm

Where: Brookstreet Hotel, Options Jazz Lounge, 525 Legget Dr, Ottawa ON, 613-271-1800, www.brookstreet.ca
Event Status: confirmed
Event Description: Join Ottawa jazz singer & composer Steve Berndt for an evening of jazz standards with New York jazz pianist Robin Pitre. An Ottawa native, Robin has worked with Engelbert Humperdink, Marvin Hamlish and as an arranger for Harry Connick Jr. Live Jazz seven days a week! Relax in the rich and elegant warmth of a sophisticated lounge with jazz filling the air. No cover charge; no reservations required; free high speed WiFi; mouth-watering culinary creations. Please note that age of majority is required after 9 p.m. See details on times and music lineup here: http://www.brookstreet.ca/options_music.php

entry.title: Options Jazz: Mark Ferguson Quartet
entry.summary:
When: Fri Feb 14, 2014 8pm to 11:59pm  EST
Replaces event originally scheduled for: Fri Feb 14, 2014 8pm

Where: Brookstreet Hotel, Options Jazz Lounge, 525 Legget Dr, Ottawa ON, 613-271-1800, www.brookstreet.ca
Event Status: confirmed
Event Description: Mark Ferguson Quartet, a presentation of the Winter Jazz Festival: Mark Ferguson – piano and trombone; Mike Tremblay – saxophone; Ben Heard – bass; Charles Gay – drums. Mark Ferguson is an Ottawa based pianist, trombonist, composer, arranger, producer, and music educator. He has performed with many of the world’s great artists including Ella Fitzgerald, Tony Bennett, Gil Evans, Nelson Riddle, Dionne Warwick, Natalie Cole, Tom Jones, Engelbert Humperdink, Rosemary Clooney, Carol Channing, Rob McConnell & the Boss Brass, Holly Cole, Manteca, The Funk Brothers and the National Arts Centre Orchestra. Mark is a professor at Carleton University’s department of music and directs the Carleton Jazz Ensemble. He has served as a jazz clinician at high schools and universities across Canada. http://ottawajazzfestival.com/index.php/artists/mark-ferguson/ Live Jazz seven days a week! Relax in the rich and elegant warmth of a sophisticated lounge with jazz filling the air. No cover charge; no reservations required; free high speed WiFi; mouth-watering culinary creations. Please note that age of majority is required after 9 p.m. See details on times and music lineup here: http://www.brookstreet.ca/options_music.php

entry.title: Options Jazz - Steve Berndt Trio
entry.summary:
When: Sat Apr 5, 2014 8pm to 11:59pm  EDT
Replaces event originally scheduled for: Sat Apr 5, 2014 8pm

Where: Brookstreet Hotel, Options Jazz Lounge, 525 Legget Dr, Ottawa ON, 613-271-1800, www.brookstreet.ca
Event Status: confirmed
Event Description: Vocal: Steve Berndt; Piano: Mark Ferguson; Bass: Ken Kanwisher. Ottawa jazz singer Steve Berndt, bassist Ken Kanwisher and pianist Mark Ferguson return for an evening of jazz standards and ballads in the sophisticated setting of the Brookstreet Hotel's Options Lounge. Steve has just released his second jazz album called “All Over Again”, the follow up to 2012's "Déjà Vu" which has enjoyed regular airplay nationally on CBC. For more information please contact: steveberndtjazz@yahoo.com or 613 563 7080 ~~ Live Jazz seven days a week! Relax in the rich and elegant warmth of a sophisticated lounge with jazz filling the air. No cover charge; no reservations required; free high speed WiFi; mouth-watering culinary creations. Please note that age of majority is required after 9 p.m. See details on times and music lineup here: http://www.brookstreet.ca/options_music.php

Please note that age of majority is required after 9 p.m. See details on times and music lineup here: http://www.brookstreet.ca/options_music.php

entry.title: Options Jazz - Nicole Ratté
entry.summary:
When: Sat May 4, 2013 8pm to 11:59pm  EDT
Replaces event originally scheduled for: Sat May 4, 2013 8pm

Where: Brookstreet Hotel, Options Jazz Lounge, 525 Legget Dr, Ottawa ON, 613-271-1800, www.brookstreet.ca
Event Status: confirmed
Event Description: May 4: Nicole Ratté - Vocal; Jean-Pierre Allain - Piano. A musician and singer since childhood, Nicole evolved in different styles before developing a true passion for jazz. At home on the stage, she is known for her warm and effervescent presence and her light and sensual voice. Her performances include herfavourite jazz standards, with some special arrangements of well known French songs. She also sings in Spanish and Portuguese. Always, Nicole warms up the atmosphere and offers you a relaxed and delightful evening of jazz. www.nicoleratte.com Come and join us at Options Jazz Lounge for Live Jazz seven days a week! Relax in the rich and elegant warmth of a sophisticated lounge with jazz filling the air. Jazz: Sunday, Monday & Tuesday: 6 pm - 10 pm Wednesday: 6:30 pm - 10:30 pm Thursday JAM SESSIONS: 7 pm - 11 pm Friday & Saturday: 8 pm - midnight View the upcoming music lineup here: http://www.brookstreet.ca/options_music.php The warm, sophisticated Options Jazz Lounge is an integral part of the Brookstreet boutique hotel ambiance. A cosmopolitan interior, boasting thought-provoking architecture, is juxtaposed with bright windows offering panoramic views of the spacious patio and adjoining Marshes Golf Course. With free high speed WiFi, Options Jazz Lounge is an ideal spot for business lunches or relaxing after-work aperitifs. The menu features contemporary sushi, unique to Ottawa's West End, as well as other mouth-watering culinary creations by Brookstreet's Executive Chef Clifford Lyness. No cover charge, and no reservations required. Please note that age of majority is required after 9 p.m.
